blogPost.excerpt: Pillow is the best sleep tracker app for your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad to help you uncover the scientifically proven benefits of good sleep. Version 4.0 is a complete redesign and rewrite of the app, brining many new features and improvements.
blogPost.body: Pillow is the best sleep tracker app for your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad to help you uncover the scientifically proven benefits of good sleep. Version 4.0 is a complete redesign and rewrite of the app, brining many new features and improvements.
blogPost.title: Pillow 4.0 - Sleeping better, made simple
blogPost.author: Panos S.

localize.description: Pillow是一款适用于您的Apple Watch、iPhone或iPad的最佳睡眠追踪器应用，帮助您发现科学证明的良好睡眠的好处。4.0版本是一个完整的重新设计和重写的应用程序，带来了许多新的功能和改进。
Pillow是一款適用於您的Apple Watch、iPhone或iPad的最佳睡眠追蹤器應用，幫助您發現科學證明的良好睡眠的好處。4.0版本是一個完整的重新設計和重寫的應用程序，帶來了許多新的功能和改進。

previous.excerpt: There's an abundance of sources available for hearing the trending, breaking news updates. We keep you informed on the stories that don't make it to the front page, for free.
previous.title: Below the Fold - News you aren’t hearing anywhere else

localize.description: 有丰富的消息来源，可以听到最新的趋势，突发新闻。我们让你了解那些没有上头版的故事，免费的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方听不到的新闻

localize.description: 有豐富的消息來源，可以聽到最新的趨勢，突發新聞。我們讓你瞭解那些沒有上頭版的故事，免費的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方聽不到的新聞

next.excerpt: Generate HTML code optimal for social media, SEO, mobile for your single-page app. This uses web standards from Open Graph (Facebook) and Twitter to provide optimal results. Also generates social media posts.
next.title: Meta Tag Generator - Generate HTML code optimal for SEO, social media, & mobile.

localize.description: 为您的单页应用生成适合社交媒体、SEO、移动端的HTML代码。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的网络标准，提供最佳效果。还可以生成社交媒体帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最适合SEO、社交媒体和手机的HTML代码。

localize.description: 爲您的單頁應用生成適合社交媒體、SEO、移動端的HTML代碼。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的網絡標準，提供最佳效果。還可以生成社交媒體帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最適合SEO、社交媒體和手機的HTML代碼。
